original_text: they will pick up snakes with their hands; and when they drink deadly poison, it will not hurt them at all; they will place their hands on sick people, and they will get well.”
korean_text: 뱀을 집어올리며 무슨 독을 마실지라도 해를 받지 아니하며 병든 사람에게 손을 얹은즉 나으리라 하시더라

sentences.original_text: they will pick up snakes with their hands
it will not hurt them at all
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 전혀 그들을 해치지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: they will place their hands on sick people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 병든 사람들에게 손을 얹을 것입니다
